casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Marcus J. WALTERS. No. 305P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, Philip E. Berger, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of June 2008 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeals":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
